channel.title: Rep++, When i decline on a trade i get freezed
channel.description:
so basically when 2 players trade with each other and one of them decline, then both of them Freezes like they can't move and stuff.
i got this a while ago when i tryed to add a dupe fix, can't really remember the exact one cause i took one out of google's tutorials and they have like 50 tutorials of fixing dupes.
delta source.

item.title: Rep++, When i decline on a trade i get freezed
item.dc:creator: @pistolse pistolse
item.description:
@pistolse wrote:

read what i posted

[code]so basically when 2 players trade with each other and one of them decline, then both of them Freezes like they can’t move and stuff.

i got this a while ago when i tryed to add a dupe fix, can’t really remember the exact one cause i took one out of google’s tutorials and they have like 50 tutorials of fixing dupes.

delta source.[/code]

Delta base

[code]public void declineTrade() {
client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
if (disconnected) {
declineTrade(true);
}
if (!hasAccepted){
declineTrade(true);
}
}
public void declineTrade(boolean tellOther) {
client other = getClient(trade_reqId);
if (tellOther && validClient(trade_reqId)) {
other.sM(“Other player has declined the trade.”);
other.declineTrade(false);
}

	for (GameItem item : offeredItems) {
		if (item.amount < 1)
			continue;
		if (item.stackable) {
			addItem(item.id, item.amount);
		} else {
			for (int i = 0; i < item.amount; i++) {
				addItem(item.id, 1);
			}
		}
	}[/code]

Read full topic
item.source: Rep++, When i decline on a trade i get freezed

item.title: Rep++, When i decline on a trade i get freezed
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

Try using a different client, also what server are you using and can you post your trade method.

item.source: Rep++, When i decline on a trade i get freezed

item.title: Rep++, When i decline on a trade i get freezed
item.dc:creator: @pistolse pistolse
item.description:
@pistolse wrote:

[quote=“Efilite, post:2, topic:278527”]We do not accept reputation offers, but I have seen some servers that have Disconnect = true in the trade method, remove that and it should work.

It may not even be this, just have a look as I have noticed it before in some anti leech servers.[/quote]

it isn’t it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rep++, When i decline on a trade i get freezed
item.dc:creator: @Efilite Efilite
item.description:
@Efilite wrote:

We do not accept reputation offers, but I have seen some servers that have Disconnect = true in the trade method, remove that and it should work.

It may not even be this, just have a look as I have noticed it before in some anti leech servers.
